refnamediv.refname: Publishing C function as SOAP service
refnamediv.refpurpose: Publishing C/C++ functions as Web Services

refsect1.title: Example

itemizedlist.listitem: The Virtuoso distribution includes the sample bif, bif_sample.c. It is thus possible to create following function and make server including it.
The next step is creating a stored procedure that calls this function and you are back to publishing a Virtuoso stored procedure.
The Service for testing will just return string "Hello world".
At least 2 web threads are needed, so this should be noted before starting. An Error message is shown if only one is available.

refsect1.para: IMPORTANT: You need to start the sample server containing bif_hello_world , in order run this example.
